Package org.waltonrobotics

Class AbstractDrivetrain

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SendableBase
      • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
        • org.waltonrobotics.AbstractDrivetrain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Sendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    public abstract class AbstractDrivetrain
extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command.Subsystem
    Extend this in your drivetrain, and use the methods inside to set up spline motions
    Author:
    Russell Newton, Marius Juston, Walton Robotics

      • getNavXHeading

        protected double getNavXHeading()
        Override this if you're going to be using a RamseteController with navX feedback. It defaults to returning a Pose(0, 0, 0)
        Returns:
        a pose created form the navX data
